page.title: 11Mixed Farming In Dymchurch
page.content: Roger Piper owns Tatnum Farm,St Mary's Road.It is a mixed farm of 600 acres. There are 70 acres of pasture.This year there is a flock of about 200 ewes & 200 lambs.All sheep work is done by a contractor.Crops this year are:winter wheat (300 acres),winter barley,oil-seed rape(8o acres),pota- toes(50 acres) & peas.Expected yields per acre are:winter wheat 40 tons oil-seed rape 30 cwt potatoes 23-30 tons peas 2 & a half tons The crops are sprayed with fertilizer. Every fortnight they are also sprayed to guard against weeds,disease & pests.A sprayer is attached to a trac- tor,or the work is done by plane.Farm machinery includes 8 tractors,a com- bine-harvester,ploughs,disc-harrows, seed-drills & potato planters.Mud is removed from potatoes by machine.
